attributes.action: ensure English spellings are used in education, industry and Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst we appreciate that England is a multi-cultural society we strongly object to the use of American spellings in education, industry and Government. 

A recent OCR exam paper has the word "sulfur" instead of "sulphur" which we find unacceptable. American spellings are slowly creeping into our society and we are loosing our English identity. 

There is a petition to call for computers used in England to be defaulted to English spellings but this will only be beneficial if all main bodies within the UK support this. 

There is a large amount of work happening in schools to improve literacy with many schools having additional Learning Mentors specialising in this area. If we do not make a stand about using English spellings then all this hard work is wasted. 

England is English and we would like it to stay that way.
